name: A Day In Space (itch) (Fabiulous Games)
description:
Live a day on board of "Space Colony I" a high tech space station sent to colonise the newly discovered Planet Omega in 2040.

In this first person, interactive, space exploration experience you will:

  • Explore the giant "Space Colony I" space station, adding all its parts procedurally to your map;
  • Carry out your daily tasks (play minigames such as watering plants and training in dedicated rooms);
  • Interact with your crewmates, getting to know their personal stories;
  • Find out about the reasons behind mankind's first space colonisation;
  • Gather all the clues to find out about the staggering truth behind your cremates' deaths.


CONTROLS
  • MOUSE -> LOOK AROUND
  • WASD + SHIFT -> WALK / RUN
  • LEFT MOUSE BUTTON: INTERACT WITH OBJECTS / PROGRESS DIALOGUE
  • HOLD RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON: ZOOM  / FOCUS
  • E -> OPEN /CLOSE INVENTORY
  • TAB -> OPEN/CLOSE MAP
  • R -> OPEN/CLOSE MP5
